org.grouplens.lenskit.transform.normalize

Class DefaultItemVectorNormalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.transform.normalize.DefaultItemVectorNormalizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ItemVectorNormalizer

    @Shareable
public class DefaultItemVectorNormalizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ItemVectorNormalizer, java.io.Serializable
    Default item vector normalizer that delegates to a generic VectorNormalizer.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • normalize

        public MutableSparseVector normalize(long user,
                            @Nonnull
                            SparseVector vector,
                            @Nullable
                            MutableSparseVector target)
        Description copied from interface: ItemVectorNormalizer
        Normalize a vector with respect to an item vector.
        Specified by:
        normalize in interface ItemVectorNormalizer
        Parameters:
        user - The item id to normalize a vector for.
        vector - The item's vector for reference.
        target - The vector to normalize. If null, the item vector is normalized.
        Returns:
        The target vector, if specified. Otherwise, a fresh mutable vector containing a normalized copy of the item vector is returned.

      • makeTransformation

        public VectorTransformation makeTransformation(long user,
                                      SparseVector vector)
        Description copied from interface: ItemVectorNormalizer
        Make a vector transformation for an item. The resulting transformation will be applied to item vectors to normalize and denormalize them.
        Specified by:
        makeTransformation in interface ItemVectorNormalizer
        Parameters:
        user - The item id to normalize for.
        vector - The item's vector to use as the reference vector.
        Returns:
        The vector transformaition normalizing for this item.
